body_global_interpretation: Good body language. Balanced and effective.
gesture_magnitude_interpretation: High gesture dynamics (Excellent). Confident, expansive gestures.
gesture_magnitude_coaching: Excellent use of space. Your gestures command attention.
gesture_activity_coaching: Move your hands to emphasize key verbs. You look frozen.
gesture_jitter_interpretation: Extremely stable gestures (Excellent). Smooth, intentional movement without fidgeting.
gesture_jitter_coaching: Excellent stability. You look very composed.
body_sway_coaching: Relax your shoulders. It's okay to shift your weight slightly.
posture_openness_interpretation: Open, expansive posture (Excellent). Strong, confident posture.
posture_openness_coaching: Excellent command of space. You look authoritative.
